Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Logan Square
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Logan Square due to a medical emergency. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Logan Square due to a medical emergency.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#56 Milwaukee

#76 Diversey

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between UIC/Halsted to Jefferson Park in both directions.

Blue Line trains will turn from south to north at Jefferson Park.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
